comments.creator: asa@mozilla.com
comments.author: asa@mozilla.com
comments.text: In the Firefox menu, the cut copy and paste icons are grayed out when not available but in the sub-menu they are not grayed out when not available. They should be grayed out in both places when not available.
comments.raw_text: In the Firefox menu, the cut copy and paste icons are grayed out when not available but in the sub-menu they are not grayed out when not available. They should be grayed out in both places when not available.

comments.creator: mheres@mozilla.com
comments.author: mheres@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
This issue is also reproducible for the PDF Form Fill support feature and the Omnibus experiment. The steps to reproduce are:
**[Prerequisites]:**
- Have `pdfjs.renderInteractiveForms` set to `true`.

**[Steps to reproduce]:**
1. Open the profile from prerequisites.
2. Open a PDF form (e.g. http://foersom.com/net/HowTo/data/OoPdfFormExample.pdf).     
3. Focus on an empty field.
4. Right click and observe the options displayed.     

Tested using Firefox RC 81.0  (Build ID: 20200917005511), Firefox 80.0.1 (Build ID: 20200831163820), Firefox Nightly 82.0a1 (Build ID: 20200920213416) on Windows 10, Linux Mint 20, macOS 10.15.  Attached is recording of the [issue](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1lvrfu9OZmQizVdSrL-hI20K4sA53hk2c/view?usp=sharing).
